description:
You've just found the best, easiest tool for communicating with your iPhone contacts.
Don't take our word for it. It's free. See for yourself!

Notes for Facebook users:
Groups works with your native contacts and phone capabilities, so it's completely private.

  + Group your contacts into Friends, Family, etc.
  + Set up groups for people you meet
  + Easily create and manage groups of contacts
  + People can be in more than one group
  + Set an icon for each group - now w/more icons!
  + Easily text or email many contacts at once
  + Customize each text with the person's name, etc.
  + Attach images to your emails, use To | Cc | Bcc
  + Set reminders to get in touch with people
  + Search within groups, by any attribute
  + Works with native iPhone groups
  + Supports all iPhone screen sizes 
  + Takes advantage of the latest iOS features (like Do Not Disturb, Voice Messages etc.)

Notes for iOS 7 and iOS 8 users:
* Groups will obviously need to access your contacts in order to work.
* If you have iMessage turned on, your phone will use it to send out group messages.
* iOS 8 has much improved Group Texting capabilities that Groups can take advantage of.
releaseNotes:
Improved batch composer with templates and history
Improved startup instructions for new users 
Fixed ability to update FAQ with new answers 
Fixed URLs for reviewing the app
Slightly cleaned up the look. Working on 3.0!
